name: Orientational Collapse
description:
You're trapped on a derelict space station, with nothing but a space suit to escape with. Pull your way through zero gravity tunnels to somehow make it to the escape pods.

Made for 7DFPS2020 with Unity.

By:
Alex Tritt - Programming
Andrew Wilson - Programming, textures
Andrew Persic - Models

Thanks you to the following free sound users for their great sounds:

https://freesound.org/people/Kodack/sounds/256519/
https://freesound.org/people/WizardOZ/sounds/419341/
https://freesound.org/people/180007/sounds/445527/
